CustomField.formula: AND( Associated_Opportunity_Type__c = 'Revenue Opportunity', CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, "SLED" ), OR( CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'COR' ), CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'SEL' ), CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'STR' ) ), NOT( OR( CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'Director' ), CONTAINS( Owner:User.UserRole.Name, 'ISD' ) ) ), Discount_Approval_Needed__c = TRUE )
CustomField.label: Entry Criteria Met for IntFinDiscENTSLED
